meta.title: SEO Volume Prediction Tool | Easily Estimate Keyword Search Volume
meta.description: A free tool that collects keyword suggestions and scores the estimated search volume.

title: SEO Volume Prediction Tool
description: Just enter a keyword, and we'll predict SEO volume from Google suggestions.

input.placeholder: Enter a keyword (e.g., ramen, English lessons)

result.scoreDescription1: Very low volume. This is a niche keyword.
result.scoreDescription2: Low volume. There might be less competition.
result.scoreDescription4: High volume. This is a popular keyword.
result.scoreDescription5: Very high volume. This keyword has intense competition.

error.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.apiError: API error occurred. Please try again later.

notice.title: Usage Notes
notice.language: When searching Japanese keywords in other countries, they are automatically translated to that country's language (e.g., 'パン' → 'bread'). This works for a limited set of common keywords.
notice.location: Results may be influenced by your geographic location. For example, if you're accessing from Japan, you might still see Japanese-oriented results regardless of the country setting.
